item.title: At least 2,400 protesters are reported to have been killed in Iran during more than two weeks of nationwide unrest which has threatened the rule of the Islamic regime. 18,434 protesters have been arrested during the unrest, according to HRANA. #Iran #Iran
item.description: At least 2,400 protesters are reported to have been killed in Iran during more than two weeks of nationwide unrest which has threatened the rule of the Islamic regime. 18,434 protesters have been arrested during the unrest, according to HRANA. #Iran #Iran
